metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23451 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Barbican allows authenticated users to add/modify/delete arbitrary metadata on any secret

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-23451` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

barbican-api - 2:13.0.0-0ubuntu1.2
barbican-common - 2:13.0.0-0ubuntu1.2
barbican-keystone-listener - 2:13.0.0-0ubuntu1.2
barbican-worker - 2:13.0.0-0ubuntu1.2
python3-barbican - 2:13.0.0-0ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: barbican package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:13.0.0-0ubuntu1.2').
